twcore.core.game
Class Team

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.game.Team

public class Team
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a team of players. Provides basic ship tracking by team functionality that can be integrated with a ShipRestrictor to automatically control ship access. Also allows team captains to be defined for use elsewhere.

Version:
06.12.27
Author:
D1st0rt

Creates a new instance of Team

Parameters:

Method Detail

reset

public void reset()
Resets this team to completely empty, just as when it was instantiated This does not change the ShipRestrictor, however

getPlayers

public Player[] getPlayers(byte ship)
Gets all players on this in a specific ship

Parameters:
the - desired ship, can also be ALL or PLAYING
Returns:
an array of all Players currently in that ship

Gets a player by name

Parameters:

Returns:

getShipCount

public int getShipCount(byte ship)
Gets the number of players on this team in a particular ship

Parameters:
the - desired ship, can also be ALL or PLAYING

getShipDistribution

public Player[][] getShipDistribution()
Gets a cached array of the ship distribution of this team. If the ship distribution has changed since the last calculation, it recalculates.

Returns:
a byte[] containing the number of players in each ship by array index

addCaptain

public void addCaptain(java.lang.String name)
Makes a specified player a captain of this team

Parameters:
name - the name of the player to make captain

removeCaptain

public void removeCaptain(java.lang.String name)
Removes a specified player from being a team captain

Parameters:
name - the name of the player to demote from captain

isCaptain

public boolean isCaptain(java.lang.String name)
Determines whether a player is a team captain or not

Parameters:
name - the name of the player to check
Returns:
true if the player is a team captain, false otherwise

setRestrictor

public void setRestrictor(ShipRestrictor restrict)
Sets the ShipRestrictor this team uses to restrict ship access. If restrictor is null, the team will be set to use a Restrictor that allows full access to all ships.

Parameters:
restrictor - the new ShipRestrictor to use

getRestrictor

public ShipRestrictor getRestrictor()
Gets the ShipRestrictor used to restrict ships for this team

Returns:
ShipRestrictor object used by this team

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerEntered event)
Updates the player list and ship distribution as necessary when a player enters.
